DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , sequential , ascend , multi-dose , Phase 1/2 study enroll 198 post-menopausal subject advance metastatic breast cancer whose tumor overexpress HER2 . Subjects dose level receive KW-2450 orally , continuous daily schedule combination lapatinib letrozole . In Phase 1 portion study , dose escalation may proceed ≥ 3 subject complete Day 30 . The safety dose level establish prior enrollment subject next dose level . Dose escalation proceed sequentially . Up 6 subject may enrol dose level . Enrollment proceed MTD establish high dose level reach . The Phase 2 portion trial enroll 168 additional subject . The dose level base overall safety tolerability assessment Phase 1 portion study . The subject randomize two treatment arm ( 1 ) Arm A , KW-2450 plus lapatinib plus letrozole : ( 2 ) Arm B , lapatinib plus letrozole . This study terminate Phase 1 never proceed Phase 2 portion study .
